text: Thank you so much! I'm sorry I didn't see all your notifications. I ended up doing exactly as stated above: uploaded the file in the HS file section and set up proxy redirect and it worked like a charm. Thanks again for all your suggestions!

hi everyone! :wave:

we're facing an issue with bot traffic to our website every time we send out an emails from HubSpot. the huge bot traffic spikes are reflected in HubSpot and google analytics so we're trying hard to get this problem solved. we've already been in touch with HubSpot and the bot toggle is activated. however, HubSpot is not able to filter out the malicious traffic as our bot behavior does not meet their requirements to exclude bot traffic.

has anyone faced a similar issue and was able to find a solution or would anyone be able to help us tackle this issue?

thank you so much!

not sure if this will help anyone else, but i solved the issue i was having. i was trying to trigger sending an nps rating to an endpoint, and the comment was not being sent. i put a 10 min delay first and the comments started sending.
